title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2021 that cover various aspects of event-centric natural language processing (NLP
container-title: including natural language understanding (NLU), event extraction, commonsense understanding, and other relevant topics

title: **"Event Extraction from Text: A Survey"**
A comprehensive survey on event extraction techniques and methodologies

author.literal: **"Deep Learning for Event-Driven Stock Prediction"** - *X. Ding, Y. Zhang, T. Liu, and J. Duan

title: Discusses the application of deep learning for predicting stock market movements based on event extraction

container-title: **"A Survey on Event Detection Techniques in Social Multimedia"**

title: Reviews various techniques for detecting events in social multimedia data
**"Event Detection and Summarization in Twitter: A Survey"**
Surveys methods for detecting and summarizing events from Twitter data

author.literal: **"Joint Event Extraction via Recurrent Neural Networks"** - *D. Nguyen, R. Grishman

title: Proposes a recurrent neural network model for joint event extraction

author.literal: **"Event Extraction Using Distant Supervision"** - *M. Mintz, S. Bills, R. Snow, and D. Jurafsky

title: Introduces distant supervision techniques for event extraction
**"Event Detection and Classification on Twitter: A Survey"**
A survey focusing on event detection and classification on Twitter

author.literal: **"A Survey on Event Extraction Methods from Text"** - *S. Yang, K. Liu, L. Zhao, and J. Zhao

title: Reviews various methods for extracting events from text

author.literal: **"Event Extraction from Newswire Articles"** - *H. Ji and R. Grishman

title: Discusses techniques for extracting events from newswire articles
**"Event Detection and Tracking in Social Media: A State-of-the-Art Survey"**
Surveys state-of-the-art techniques for event detection and tracking in social media

author.literal: **"Event Extraction as Dependency Parsing"** - *L. Sha, Z. Qian, B. Chang, and Z. Sui

title: Proposes a dependency parsing approach for event extraction

author.literal: **"Commonsense Knowledge in Machine Intelligence"** - *E. Davis and G. Marcus

title: Discusses the role of commonsense knowledge in machine intelligence

author.literal: **"Event Extraction via Dynamic Multi-Pooling Convolutional Neural Networks"** - *Y. Chen, L. Xu, K. Liu, D. Zeng, and J. Zhao

title: Introduces a dynamic multi-pooling convolutional neural network for event extraction

author.literal: **"A Survey on Event Extraction from Text"** - *S. Yang, K. Liu, L. Zhao, and J. Zhao

title: Reviews various methods for extracting events from text
**"Event Detection and Summarization in Social Media: A Survey"**
Surveys techniques for event detection and summarization in social media
**"Event Extraction from Biomedical Text Using a Hidden Vector State Model"**
Discusses event extraction from biomedical text using a hidden vector state model
**"Event Extraction from Clinical Text Using a Convolutional Neural Network"**
Proposes a convolutional neural network for event extraction from clinical text
**"Event Extraction from Text Using a Generative Adversarial Network"**
Introduces a generative adversarial network for event extraction from text
**"Event Extraction from Text Using a Recurrent Neural Network"**
Proposes a recurrent neural network for event extraction from text
**"Event Extraction from Text Using a Transformer Model"**
Introduces a transformer model for event extraction from text
These articles provide a broad overview of the field and cover various techniques and applications of event-centric NLP
